ActAeronautics Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I AND III) which will replace the existing standards and recommended practices addressing airport emergency response planning with performance-based provisions allowing site-specific plans to be developed and implemented by airport operators.
